ImageMetaTag - Image metadata tagging and presentation
======================================================

.. automodule:: ImageMetaTag

All ImageMetaTag source code, unless explicitly stated, is Â© British Crown copyright, 2015-2018 and is released under a BSD 3-Clause License. The source code and more details of the licence are given on `github <https://github.com/SciTools-incubator/image-meta-tag>`_.

Supported image file formats: png
